Options to use when listing objects

Index

Properties

  • after
  • include
  • limit
  • order

Properties

Optional after

after: string

The ID of the item after which to retrieve the next page

Optional include

include: Array<IncludeEnum>

Optional fields to include

Optional limit

limit: number

How many objects to retrieve in the page

Optional order

order: OrderEnum

ASC or DESC
